item.description:
After careful consideration, the prepaid meal purchase has been removed for this event. Attendees will pay individually for their own meal. Please remember to tip well and support our black institutions.

 

The most popular event choice in our poll was a weekend lunch so here we go:

Lunch at Lorenz

You joined the group to network and meet new people so let's do it!

Lorenz Island Kuisine has received a top restaurant award from Boston Globe and serves a variety of Jamaican style meat and vegetarian options.

Plenty of street parking is available and it is near a bus stop.
item.name: Lunch at Lorenz
